info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:29PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Kankakee, northern Newton and southwestern Lake Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 429 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hopkins Park to near Kankakee. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kankakee, Bourbonnais, Bradley, Manteno, Momence, Lake Village, Roselawn, Limestone, Grant Park, Aroma Park, Hopkins Park, Shelby, Sun River Terrace, Schneider, Sumava Resorts and Thayer. Including the following interstates... I-57 between mile markers 311 and 320. Indiana I-65 between mile markers 233 and 235. This includes...Kankakee Community College and Olivet Nazarine University. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
